content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I want to get the highest price possible for it. Let's negotiate the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to rent the apartment at the lowest price. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
